summary: Completed comprehensive testing of arXiv AI Research Q&A System. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with dark theme, stats display, search functionality, sync capabilities, and recent papers panel. Integration between frontend and backend is seamless. Sync process successfully fetched 50 papers from arXiv and AI-powered search with Claude Sonnet is generating quality answers with relevant sources.
passed_tests: GET /api/stats - Returns all required stats fields
GET /api/papers/recent - Returns paper list (empty initially, populated after sync)
POST /api/sync/trigger - Successfully triggers arXiv paper sync
POST /api/search - Generates AI answers with Claude Sonnet and returns relevant sources
Frontend loads with proper dark theme
Stats cards display real data correctly
Search input and Ask AI button functional
Example question chips are clickable and populate search
Recent Papers panel shows 20 papers after sync
Sync Papers button present and functional
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and integrations working)
